newhires.slackWhere: Where should we send this invite to?
newhires.slackDefault: By default, this is the business email address from the new hire.
newhires.modalGoogleTitle: Where should we send this invite to?
newhires.modalGoogleDescr: This should NEVER be their corporate email address. Otherwise, they will never receive their login credentials.
newhires.sendLoginMail: Send log in email (day 1 and onwards)
newhires.removeNewHireHeader: Are you sure you want to remove this new hire?
newhires.removeNewHireDescr:
Removing this new hire will remove all their form submition and statistics. It will keep their resources open to use even after they have been onboarded.

Removing a new hire is not reversable.

newhires.notReady: We couldn't get this page ready for you.

newhires.dragAndDrop: Drag and drop the items to change the order

newhires.noOverviewTasks: This new hire does not have any tasks yet
newhires.noOrder: We couldn't change the order, please try again
newhires.noAnswers: No answers were given by the new hire.
newhires.reOpenHeader: Reopen this task for this new hire?
newhires.reOpenDescr: This will remove any data that has been filled in by the new hire for this task and allow them to complete it again.
newhires.noWelcomeMessage: No one has left a welcome message yet. If onboardingbot didn't send out the message to your Slack channel, then make sure it is invited to that channel.
newhires.sendPreEmailDescr: This will send an email or text message to your new hire providing them the link to use see their pre-boarding page. You can send a text message (if mobile number is provided) or an email. Make sure that you are sending the email to an email address that is accesible to them right now!
newhires.alreadySendNotification: This notification has been sent already. If you resend it, the link in the previous one will become invalid.
newhires.couldNotSendMessage: We couldn't send the email/text, please try again.
newhires.sendEmailHeader: Send log in email to new hire
newhires.sendEmailNewHireDescr:
You can manually send a login email to your new hire. If you don't, then we will send it to the new hire on their first day. If you set the start date in past or today, then we will send it within 20 minutes.

This email is send to the email address of the new hire.

onboarding.descr: Welcome to the platform that will change the way you onboard your new hires. We have all the tools you need to streamline your onboarding process and give your new hires everything they need to succeed. Enjoy our software for one month for free. No strings attached.

There are a few things that we need to configure based on how you intent to use our software.

Before a new hire starts, you can create pre-boarding pages for them. These pages can be accessed through a link that will be send to them through a text message or email message. Once a new hire starts, you can choose to let them use the online portal or our Slack bot. Both have the same features.

Which one do you want to use? Don't worry, you can always change this later.

Let's start by adding some employees in the system. You can use them to introduce to new hires, give them acces to resources and even use them in sequences (to send text messages to for example). Don't add new hires here.

To get you started quickly, we have added a bunch of items to your account already. If you don't like them, feel free to remove them and create your own - but we are sure you will love them.

Up next, we will show you a few quick videos that will help you to understand our platform better. Our platform is very easy to learn, but these videos will help you get started even quicker.

onboarding.header: One last thing, before we let you go.
onboarding.descr: If you ever need help, then know that we are here for you. We absolutely love feedback and we couldn't have build our platform without it. If you have a question/feedback/suggestion or just want to say hi, we are always happy to chat through our chat widget in the left-bottom corner of your screen. Our chat is staffed 6 days a week (Mon-Sat) during both USA and EU office hours.

global.totalAvail: Amount of new hire spots available:
global.alwaysSendNewHireWelcomeEmail: Always send new hire welcome email
global.newHireLoginCred: This means that we will always send a welcome email to your new hire with their login credentials. This is best to be used when you are using the online portal. It's recommended to disable this when you are using Slack as Slack does not need the login credentials.
global.loginWithGoogle: They can use their Google account to login instead of their log in credentials.
global.loginWithGoogleLabel: Allow users to login with GMail/Google Suite account.
global.sendEmailReminder: We will send a reminder to your new hire via email when a task is due. It's best to disable this when you are using the Slack bot as that will automatically send them the notifications.
global.addButtonsLabel: Add buttons to first Slack message
global.addButtons: When we find a new hire in your Slack team, we will directly send them the welcome message you created. With this option, you can add some interactive buttons called 'todo' and 'resources'. All will show the items that are relevant to the button when they click on it.
global.sendReminderWhenDue: We will send a reminder to your new hire via email when a task is overdue. It's best to disable this when you are using the Slack bot as that will automatically send them the notifications.
global.askWelcomeMessage: When enabled, we will send a message to your #general channel to ask for a welcome message from colleagues. Any colleague that is in our system as an employee or admin will be able to do this. Don't forget to invite onboardingbot to that channel.
global.sendReminderNewHireIsStartingLabel: Send reminder that new hire is starting
global.sendReminderNewHireIsStarting: With this enabled, we will send a message to the #general channel letting everyone know that a new hire is starting on that day.
global.notSavedSettings: We couldn't save these settings. Please try again.
global.customNotSaved: We couldn't save these settings. Please try again.
global.billingSaved: Billing information has been saved succesfully.
global.billingNotSaved: Billing information could not be saved.
global.autoCreateUser: Automatically create new hire when joining Slack
global.withoutConfirm: New hires are created without manual approval

integrations.slackCreateAccountsDescr: By enabling this you will have the option to create a Slack account for them  during the new hire registration process. It will send the new hire an invite email to your Slack team.
integrations.googleLoginDescr: Let users sign in through Google
integrations.googleAccountsDescr: Connect Google to automatically create new Google accounts for new hires.
